name: Ladders & Snakes
description:
-A GMTK 2022 entry-

Join Abe and Benny on a truly unforgettable evening in a remote mountain cabin.

We promise you will encounter:

- More ladders than you could shake a snake at! (please don't shake the snake)

- More snakes than you could shake a ladder at! (please don't shake the ladder)

- A "loving" tribute to early 2000s pop rock!

- Passive aggression!

*warning: jump scare*

estimated playtime: 5 minutes
